[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][apus_title_heading title=”A one stop collaboration of Jobseekers and employees”][/apus_title_heading][vc_column_text]

American OPT is the best job seeker and employee collaboration platform and an innovative job portal. It provides the best opt and cpt jobs in US. The portal connects the job seekers with the employers by registering on the portal. The portal gives an access to Optional Practical Training –OPT ,Curricular Practical Training –CPT, Internship, entry level jobs, IT jobs in USA, Contract jobs in USA and more. Job seekers can also search for the employers who can offer H1b visa during the employment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”1277″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1597665017122{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][apus_title_heading title=”Why American OPT?”][/apus_title_heading][vc_column_text]

AmericanOPT platform is the best place to surf the range of job postings across the USA. It is the best platform for CPT jobs in USA. Our portal is a key destination for the job seekers to acieve their next career goals. Here, the job seekers can utilize the range of features like Resume blast, where they can shoot their resume to multiple positions at one shot. They can also prioritize their resumes and get noticed at top search results.

Job seekers can access to millions of jobs from thousands of company websites. Our platform is the most effective one for employers as well job seekers to hire and get hired in a better way. AmericanOPT is very passionate about delivering best talent pool and jobs pool for both employees and employers at one place.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
